name: MMO Healing Simulator
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Left click and Right click to use abilities

---------------------------------------------------

Arcade-styled game where you get to test your mettle where it matters: healing randoms and trying to make them not die while they scream their heads off at you.

This is a twist off the Weekly Game Jam theme "Got a match?" That phrase can be used sarcastically to imply that someone has their hands full. So I developed a game where you will always have your hands full. In other words, when someone asks you for a match, your answer will have to be "no."
